definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
local anesthetic/anesthesia to half the body (as for a C-section birth)

sentences.english: Their drug of choice was a potent intoxicant they called hashish.
sentences.chinese: 他們選擇的是一種他們稱爲“黑煞”的烈性麻醉劑。

sentences.english: The team found the sense of ownership still occurred when participants' fingers were anaesthetized.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員發現當受試者的手指被麻醉時，仍有感知。

sentences.english: Anesthetics alter thermoregulatory responses in all patients.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉改變病人的體溫調節反應。

sentences.english: This section concentrates on features of particular relevance to the anesthetist.
sentences.chinese: 本部分將集中探討與麻醉醫生相關的方面。

sentences.english: It is flammable, explosive, toxic and anesthetize nerve centres.
sentences.chinese: 易燃易爆，有毒，能使神經中樞麻醉。

sentences.english: Putin quickly shot the beast and sedated it with a tranquilizer gun.
sentences.chinese: 就在這時，普京迅速拿起一杆麻醉槍將其射倒。

sentences.english: Objective To conclude the experience from trabeculectomy under topical anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結表面麻醉下小梁切除術的體會。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the effect of Kaisailu on urinary retention induced by intra-vertebral canal anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討開塞露治療椎管內麻醉術後尿瀦留的療效。

sentences.english: This is the web page of Department of Anaesthesia, Monash University.
sentences.chinese: 這是曼納士大學麻醉學系的網頁。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the utilization of narcotic analgesics in our hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解我院門診麻醉性鎮痛藥的使用情況。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the anesthesia methods and management of the patients with epigastrium operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討糖尿病患者上腹部手術麻醉的方法。

sentences.english: You may wonder why having a horn cut off requires anaesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 你可能會覺得奇怪，爲什麼去掉牛角需要麻醉？

sentences.english: A nurse anesthetist unearthed a nest.
sentences.chinese: 一名護理麻醉師掘出一套器具。

sentences.english: Both clinical and technical monitoring must not be limited only to the patient but also include the anaesthetic machine.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀監測和技術監測不必僅限於動物也可包括麻醉機。

sentences.english: Jackson regularly received the anaesthetic propofol to go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 傑克遜會定期服用麻醉劑異丙酚幫助睡眠。

sentences.english: Hobit is the chloroform of love.

definition: general anesthetic/abbr. for 全身麻醉
